name: Nhà thờ Đức Bà biểu tượng
address: Công xã Paris, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Nhà thờ Đức Bà is a symbol of Saigon with its iconic French architecture and towering spires.

name: Dinh Độc Lập
address: 135 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Dinh Độc Lập, also known as the Independence Palace, is a historic landmark where the Fall of Saigon took place in 1975.

name: Bưu điện Thành phố
address: 2 Công xã Paris, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Bưu điện Thành phố is a beautiful colonial-era post office building with stunning French architecture.

name: Nhà hát thành phố
address: 7 Công Trường Lam Sơn, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The Saigon Opera House is a grand building that hosts many important events and performances.

name: Bảo tàng lịch sử thành phố Hồ Chí Minh
address: 2 Nguyễn Bỉnh Khiêm, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The Ho Chi Minh City Museum of History is home to fascinating exhibitions on the history of Vietnam.

name: Bảo tàng Mỹ thuật TP.HCM
address: 97A Phó Đức Chính, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The Fine Arts Museum in Ho Chi Minh City showcases Vietnamese art, as well as international collections.

name: Chợ Bến Thành
address: Chợ Bến Thành, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Chợ Bến Thành is a bustling market that is a symbol of Saigon, offering local goods, food, and souvenirs.

name: Bến Nhà Rồng
address: 1 Nguyễn Tất Thành, Quận 4, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Bến Nhà Rồng is a historic port where Ho Chi Minh left Vietnam for his revolutionary work in 1911.

name: Địa đạo Củ Chi
address: Củ Chi, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: The Cu Chi Tunnels are a vast network of tunnels used by the Viet Cong during the Vietnam War.

name: Dinh Gia Long
address: 135 Nam Kỳ Khởi Nghĩa, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Dinh Gia Long was the residence of the former emperors and a landmark in Saigon's history.

name: Tòa nhà Landmark 81
address: 720A Điện Biên Phủ, Quận Bình Thạnh, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Landmark 81 is the tallest building in Vietnam, offering spectacular views of Ho Chi Minh City.

name: Tòa nhà Bitexco
address: 2 Hải Triều, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Bitexco Tower is a modern skyscraper in the heart of Saigon, symbolizing the city's rapid growth and prosperity.

name: Chung cư 42 Nguyễn Huệ
address: 42 Nguyễn Huệ, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Chung cư 42 Nguyễn Huệ is a popular spot for photography and enjoying coffee with a view of the city.

name: Phố đi bộ Nguyễn Huệ
address: Nguyễn Huệ, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Nguyễn Huệ Walking Street is a vibrant street with many events, performances, and food stalls.

name: Phố đi bộ Bùi Viện
address: Bùi Viện, Quận 1, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Bùi Viện Street is a lively nightlife area in Ho Chi Minh City, famous for its bars and clubs.

name: Khu du lịch Văn Thánh
address: Phường 22, Quận Bình Thạnh, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Văn Thánh is a serene eco-tourism area offering a peaceful atmosphere amidst nature.

name: Khu du lịch sinh thái Bình Quới
address: Bình Quới, Quận Bình Thạnh, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Bình Quới Eco-tourism site is known for its traditional Vietnamese village atmosphere and scenic views.

name: Rừng Sác Cần Giờ
address: Cần Giờ, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Cần Giờ is a vast mangrove forest and UNESCO biosphere reserve, home to diverse wildlife.

name: Khu du lịch sinh thái Dần Xây
address: Dần Xây, Củ Chi, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Dần Xây Eco-tourism site offers a tranquil escape with lush green surroundings.

name: Khu du lịch sinh thái Song Long
address: Song Long, TP. Hồ Chí Minh, Vietnam
description: Song Long Eco-tourism site is a peaceful place for nature lovers, offering a variety of outdoor activities.
